node2.name: CSU Statium
node2.intro: The appearance of the stadium is novel and the whole is geometrically shaped. The frame structure system is adopted and the roof is a large-span steel truss structure, in which the main span of the steel truss of the gymnasium is 92.1 meters, which is the largest in Hunan stadiums.

node3.name: CSU LAR Institute
node3.intro: The Light Alloy Research Institute of Central South University is a secondary research and teaching institution under Central South University, which focuses on scientific research.

node4.name: Languages College
node4.intro: With a history of 49 years, the College of Foreign Languages of Central South University was established from the former College of Foreign Languages of Changsha Railway College, College of Foreign Languages of Central South University of Technology and Foreign Language Department of Hunan Medical University.

node5.name: Chalco Technology Building
node5.intro: Chinalco Group is an important state-owned backbone enterprise directly managed by the central government, mainly engaged in mineral resources development, non-ferrous metal smelting and processing, related trade and engineering services, etc.

node6.name: Teaching Block D
node6.intro: It is the most hi-tech building in CSU

node7.name: CSU Library
node7.intro: The library of Central South University was formed in July 2000 by the merger of the library of the former Central South University of Technology, the library of the former Hunan Medical University and the library of the former Changsha Railway Institute with the restructuring of the university.

node8.name: Arts College
node8.intro: A new type of college that integrates teaching and research, design practice and art performance, adhering to the concept of big art, big design and big creativity

node9.name: Hunan Art Museum
node9.intro: Hunan Art Museum is a new business card for the construction of Hunan's strong cultural province, and is a public welfare institution under the Hunan Provincial Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

node10.name: New Campus Gate
node10.intro: It is adjacent to Xiangjiang River
